game.name: Deforb
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Deforb is a roguelite top-down shooter game where a mad orb defends its tower using up to four melee guns, a long-range gun, and strategically placed turrets. Upgrade your skills and craft powerful builds to survive relentless waves of enemies.
